content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an iron_sword, I need to first craft an iron_ingot. I already have an iron_block at slot 44, so I will move it to the crafting table in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
